name: Thy Flesh Vored
summary: Everyone trembles at the sound of his name. Everyone remembers those distant memories of sleepless nights trying to achieve victory. Countless deaths are forgotten in ancient corners. Rivers of blood overflow to give way to oceans of curse. Your flesh is consumed by sin itself. Trapped in marble fortresses, surrounded by hellish castles, deep in gothic hells and exiled in a world of gore. This is Thy Flesh Vored, a project inspired by the dreaded E4 of Ultimate Doom, and one that is coming for your flesh. Hand it over.
